content: need a quick gorgeous pair of slippers the star slippers are the perfect thing these slippers are made by a simple rectangle using the gorgeous star stitch we make one edge tighter than the other so that we can more easily cinch it for the toe materials worsted weight yarn chroma worsted 1 -approx 100 120 140 160 180 230 270 yards total crochet hook in size h/5mm 2 stitch markers 3 there is a video tutorial to go along with these slippers 1 https //tidd ly/4lnyhbf 2 https //tidd ly/4kzqz7o 3 https //tidd ly/4nsihxb
